B

battleship - package battleship
 
Battleship - Class in battleship
The Battleship class is the main class for the battleship board game.
Battleship() - Constructor for class battleship.Battleship
 
Board - Class in battleship
The Board class represents the game board for the Battleship game, including player ships, grenades, and methods handling game logic.
Board() - Constructor for class battleship.Board
 

C

Cell - Class in battleship
The Cell class represents a single cell in the battleship game grid.
Cell(char, String, int, int) - Constructor for class battleship.Cell
Constructs a Cell object with the specified type, owner, row, and column.

G

Retrieves the boolean indicating whether the cell has been called.

P

printBoard() - Method in class battleship.Board

Sets computer's grenade on the battleship board.

startGame() - Method in class battleship.Board
